casebody.data:
Morris LUSTIG, Plaintiff in Error, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant in Error. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. December 5, 1927. No. 29. Alexander Wolf, of New York City (William J. Millard, of New York City, of counsel), for plaintiff in error. Charles H. Tuttle, U. S. Atty., of New York City (Robert B. Watts, Asst. U. S. Atty., of New York City, of counsel), for the United States.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and SWAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
